杳冥.definition: dim and dusky; far and indistinct

杳如黃鶴.definition: to be gone forever (idiom); to disappear without a trace

杳杳.definition: deep and somber; see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]

杳無人煙.definition: see 杳無人跡|杳无人迹[yao3wu2ren2ji4]

杳無人跡.definition: (idiom) without trace of human presence; uninhabited; deserted

杳無消息.definition: see 杳無音信|杳无音信[yao3 wu2 yin1 xin4]

杳然.definition: quiet, silent, and lonely; far and indistinct; gone without a trace
